TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed ContextMenuService extends System.Object
public ref class ContextMenuService abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供用于显示 的系统实现。

span.span: Provides the system implementation for displaying a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类提供了可用于指定的外观和上下文菜单的位置的附加的属性。The class provides attached properties that can be used to specify the appearance and position of a context menu. 中的属性的许多类还定义由。Many of the properties in the class are also defined by the . 有时是更方便地使用设置属性比类上设置的属性。Sometimes it is more convenient to set the properties by using the class than by setting the properties on a . 例如，可以创建为由多个元素的共享，但使用类，以指定其他位置的每个元素。For example, you can create a to be shared by multiple elements, but use the class to specify a different position of the for each element. 以下属性定义由和类。The following properties are defined by the and classes. 如果对同时设置了这些属性的任何并，属性值从使用。If any of these properties are set on both and the , the property value from the is used. - - - - - - 此外可以使用禁用项上显示菜单。You can also use the to display menus on disabled items. ## Examples 下面的示例将相同对两个按钮和集， ， ， ，和属性设置到每个按钮的不同位置。The following example assigns the same to two buttons and sets the , , , , and properties to set the to different positions for each button. [!code-xaml[ContextMenuService_snip#SharedContextMenu](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContextMenuService_snip/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#sharedcontextmenu)] 下面的示例演示如何使用服务来显示对禁用的按钮。The following example shows how to use the service to display a on a disabled button. 请注意，您设置父级的上下文菜单的按钮的属性。Notice that you set the property on the button that is the parent of the context menu. [!code-xaml[ContextMenu#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContextMenu/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当将打开，值设置为值。When the opens, the value is set to the value of . 此属性设置为`true`如果不起作用属性是`false`。Setting this property to `true` has no effect if the property is `false`. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例将相同对两个按钮和集， ， ， ，和属性设置到每个按钮的不同位置。The following example assigns the same to two buttons and sets the , , , , and properties to set the to different positions for each button. [!code-xml[ContextMenuService_snip#SharedContextMenu](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContextMenuService_snip/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#sharedcontextmenu)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当属性是`false`用户右键单击父控件时，不会不会显示上下文菜单。When the property is `false` the context menu does not appear when the user right-clicks the parent control. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|无None| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何通过设置来禁用上下文菜单属性设置为 false。The following example shows how to disable a context menu by setting the property to false. [!code-xml[ContextMenuService_snip#ContextMenuServiceIsEnabled](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContextMenuService_snip/CSharp/Pane1.xaml#contextmenuserviceisenabled)]
